io.micronaut.core.attr

Interface AttributeHolder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationContext, BeanContext, HttpMessage<B>, HttpRequest<B>, HttpResponse<B>, InvocationContext<T,R>, MethodInvocationContext<T,R>, MutableAttributeHolder, MutableHttpMessage<B>, MutableHttpRequest<B>, MutableHttpResponse<B>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNettyHttpRequest, DefaultApplicationContext, DefaultBeanContext, FullHttpRequest, FullNettyClientHttpResponse, HttpMessageWrapper, HttpRequestWrapper, HttpResponseWrapper, InterceptorChain, MethodInterceptorChain, NettyHttpRequest, NettyMutableHttpResponse, SimpleHttpRequest

    public interface AttributeHolder
    An interface for objects that have attributes.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
